control.visible: !String.IsEqual(Skin.String(WeatherIcons.name),Weather Icons - HD Animated) + !String.IsEqual(Skin.String(WeatherIcons.name),Weather Icons - Cloud Animated) + !String.IsEqual(Skin.String(WeatherIcons.name),Weather Icons - Animated)

item.label: $INFO[Window(weather).Property(Hourly.$PARAM[item_index].Time)]
